title: Blair, Bush & Iraq | 5. Curveball
description:
An Iraqi defector’s evidence becomes crucial to the case for regime change in Iraq. His codename is Curveball. Meanwhile journalists at the Knight Ridder news organisation investigate whether the White House is using bogus intelligence to make the case for war.



A Somethin' Else Production.
